subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The football teams from Williams (7-0) and Amherst (6-1) will meet on Saturday for the 125th time in what is called the Biggest Little Game in America.
snippet: The football teams from Williams (7-0) and Amherst (6-1) will meet on Saturday for the 125th time in what is called the Biggest Little Game in America.
